mapper.select: SELECT writingnum, title, email, password, content, filepath FROM writing WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startNum}-1 and #{endNum}+1 ORDER BY writingnum DESC
SELECT logNum, writingnum, changetime FROM log WHERE writingnum = #{writingnum} and ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WRITING(title, email, password, content, filepath) VALUES(#{title}, #{email}, #{password}, #{content}, #{filePath});
INSERT INTO Log(writingnum, changetime) VALUES(#{writingnum}, SYS_DATE);
